comment.author: 53656103@N07
comment._content:
On the right - George Parker - is my Grandfather!  He married Emily Rice who was obviously related to the man on the left.  If you have any more photographs of the Parker/Rice family from Ballandean, please let me know.  George had a son Cecil and I am one of his three daughters.... we all live in Brisbane.

Susan Parker

comment.author: 32605636@N06
comment._content: Hi Susan. We do have some images of people with the surnames of Parker and Rice. You can search for them on Picture Queensland (www.pictureqld.slq.qld.gov.au) to see if they are related to you.

comment.author: 53656103@N07
comment._content:
Thank you so much - we have very little knowledge of this side of the family and would love to find out more.   Will do a search as you suggested.

Susan
